lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to help strong and brave individuals to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies communicate with their customers, employees and media.

lender.name: Pål
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: Christopher Watson
lender.occupational_info: I fly planes.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: It's such a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I help people recover from injury or illness.

lender.name: Jesper
lender.loan_because: I afford it.
lender.occupational_info: Assembling thermal infrared cameras.

lender.name: twoship
lender.loan_because: It's more fun to share the cake rather than eat it alone.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to participate in the major part of any longer bull run in the financial markets and avoiding the major part of any longer bear market.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I believe a loan engages the entrepreneurial spirit much more than simple charity or a handout, thereby helping people to help themselves for the long-term.
lender.occupational_info: I generate income from the movements in the stock market

lender.name: Emma Rowena
lender.loan_because: Living in a wealthy country I have been given opportunities that very many people will never have. I have been extremely fortunate, and this gives me a responsibility to do something to give people less fortunate the chance to improve their lives and fortunes. Also - it is exciting to be given an opportunity to follow entrepreneurs all over the world, and see how they build and expand their businesses so as to improve their living conditions!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a freelancer, living from gig to gig. My instrument is the piano, and I mostly play with singers - opera as well as pop. Together with my colleagues I have worked very hard to build a platform as a musician, and have been fortunate enough to live mainly off music.

lender.name: Tormod
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference :-D

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: Why not use our money for something positive, instead of needless, unsustainable consumption?

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: "No tengo much pero lo que tengo es suyo."
lender.occupational_info: I live on the WIDE Pamlico River and lead a "river" life. We catch crabs in a cage at the end of our dock for dinner, we sail whenever we want. We drink wine at sunsets and we appreciate nature at its best.

lender.name: Mary and Rory
lender.loan_because: it feels good.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I want to help less fortunate people get on their feet and I belive micro loans are a more sustainable way to help instead of just donating money or clothes
lender.occupational_info: I work as a technical consultant, developing IT systems suchs as enterprise resource planning systems for the process industry

lender.name: Jan Frode
lender.loan_because: I believe these loans can make a big difference

lender.name: Fredrik Olivia Anja
lender.loan_because: we can and want to.....

lender.name: DIANE
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate enough to be able to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I review documents and projects concerning computer software.

lender.name: Annelie
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy

lender.name: Patrik Malmquist
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to be born in a rich country then it is my duty to help people born in a less fortunate economic climate.
lender.occupational_info: Helping all kinds of organizations to develop their mobile work life, in order to raise productivity, build better customer relation and work satisfaction for employees.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility and privilege, and because I want to have a greater sense of my connection with all people, everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: As a life coach, I help people figure out how to make their lives more of what they want: better family life, better job, more love, more peace, more hope.

lender.name: Kristian
lender.loan_because:
Many people possess an entrepreneurial spirit, but often lack modest funds to kick-start their visions and ideas. I give loans in order to help others realize themselves and secure their loved ones.
I loan only to countries in which I have travelled and experienced a small portion of their hardships and found an unparallel ability to work though their troubles.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer software that helps others run their business.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Environmental awareness for people and animals.

lender.name: Johns
lender.loan_because: it gives me tremendous joy to touch the lives of people and to do my bit in ushering in a world where everyone is equal and has equal opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer by profession. I create print and web designs.

lender.name: Jo Ann
lender.loan_because: I rely on people who believe in me and my business. This is my way of passing it on.

lender.name: Inspera
lender.loan_because: We want to stimulate to entrepreneurship in undeveloped countries.
lender.occupational_info: We provide online learning tools for education.

lender.name: The Nankies
lender.loan_because: We loan because we learn about people in other parts of the world and we are more aware of how hard they have to work to make a living.

lender.name: Shelby
lender.loan_because: This world is smaller than we think.
lender.occupational_info: I organize things and move projects along.

lender.name: Tone
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world to become better, it's easy and it's not a lot of money, but hopefully enough to make a change for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I help people when they have technical problems.

lender.name: Stephen P.
lender.loan_because: It is important to help people to become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit arts center

lender.name: Abbey
lender.loan_because: I think it's possible for one person to make a real difference.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I teach English.

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: my team captain tells me to
lender.occupational_info: I fly airliners around the world-I help people meet

lender.name: Lish
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to make a small difference in people's lives to help them become the best they can be and believe in themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help to build a positive image about the company, its products and services to ensure people buy their software and services.

lender.name: The Overcash Family
lender.loan_because: We all need to work together to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: We are a small family. The husband is a full-time law student. The wife works full-time for a non-profit public health organization. The son attends school and enjoys video games and reading.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I want to provide support to those who need money more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney's assistant.

lender.name: Esther
lender.occupational_info: I make maps.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody should try to help in someway

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: We can make change happen.
lender.occupational_info: We rescue businesses that have emergencies, we give them what they need to stay in business.

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: it feels so great to participate in changing the world!

lender.name: Lise
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work in the marketing team of a large global bank.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: An act of kindness is like a ripple effect. One kind gesture can lead to many acts of kindness.
lender.occupational_info: Debbie: Artist/Teacher/Writer

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to give. Christ told us to love as He did; this is a great way to do that.

lender.name: My Beautiful Sister
lender.loan_because: In memory of my sister, she loved to help

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: ICA-banken turned me down last year (not enough income). I know how it feels...

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: There is something essentially gratifying in assisting another in need of help. Kiva makes this so easy to do. And lending a hand is so much better for everyone than giving a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I lead an engineering team that designs solutions to wireless communications problems. Such systems enable communications that otherwise would be impossible.

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift certificate and I thought it was a good way for me to demonstrate to my daughters how to promote community support .
lender.occupational_info: High school physics teacher

lender.name: Lynn
lender.occupation: Sales Manager - Socially Responsible Mutual Funds

lender.name: Vikki
lender.occupational_info: I work for a petrol and convenience retailer.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: Working in Botswana through 2011

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Anti-Money Laundering

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people feed the world.
lender.occupational_info: I develop food products that are kept under refrigeration, that are targeted towards convenience.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want to show my children that you always give back in life. It completes the circle.
lender.occupational_info: International Trainer and Educator

lender.name: Bill & Laurie
lender.loan_because: No one succeeds without help. As we worked to build a good life for ourselves and our children, many people helped us. We are happy to have the opportunity to help others who are working to help their families.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I admire the work ethic and energy of these entrepreneurs. And I believe that if I can give, I should.

lender.name: Bjørn Erik
lender.loan_because: I want to provide a service to others that are not able to get proper financing elsewhere.
lender.occupational_info: I make computer systems for large companies

lender.name: Paige
lender.loan_because: I want to make a change in the world. :-)
lender.occupational_info: i am a thirteen year old girl who dreams to be an environmental scientist. I absolutely love school and as soon as I turn 15, I will volunteer at our local animal shelter and soup kitchen.

lender.name: First United Youth
lender.loan_because: we wanted our gifts to help many people and to make a real difference somewhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of Youth at a Christian Church in the USA. We wanted to give to others this year, so at our annual Christmas party, we gave money for Kiva as our gifts.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I loan for capital improvements for equipment or materials to start or expand a business, not for operating capital. Around the world entrepreneurism is self-determination and self-sufficiency no matter what language you speak, religion you worship, politics you follow or politics you are subjected.
lender.occupational_info: Serial entrepreneur!

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It's due.
lender.occupational_info: Office worker in world of entertainment advertising.

lender.name: Britt
lender.occupation: Membership Director American Wind Energy Assoc.
lender.loan_because: It seems like a simple way to have the greatest impact with other hard working entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the American Wind Energy Association. We promote the use of Clean Renewable Wind Energy which will contribute positively to the global warming problem, while creating thousands of new jobs.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: Global self-sufficiency increases positive universal karma.

lender.name: Marliene
lender.loan_because: it is nice to see people help themselves with a little help from us.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my time volunteering for Hospice, I mostly work with dying people.. or people who have lost a loved one and I listen to what they want to share.

lender.name: Zoë
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: We are one world and one people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to
lender.occupational_info: I create the timetables for 3000 students who study at the school where I work

lender.name: Curious Joe
lender.loan_because: Help people to develop their own local businesses. Kiva is a unique opportunity to directly influence and contribute. I hope these initiatives can help more people to get (more) education to better understand the challenges our planet is facing. This hopefully can lead to local efforts avoiding all the same mistakes all over again.
lender.occupational_info: Making people communicate better and more naturally. Providing higher efficiency as well as reducing green gas emmissions...

lender.name: brenda
lender.loan_because: if everyone loaned just $25 or more to someone who had less money than they did, the world would be a far better place
lender.occupational_info: when there is work, i eat well and have money. in winter or when there is no work, times are harder.

lender.name: Enid
lender.loan_because: I want to help women
lender.occupational_info: helping women and children

lender.name: Atheist for Peace
lender.loan_because: I am accidentally amongst the haves whose lifestyle benefits from the work of those who have not.
lender.occupational_info: I work with technology to improve health care and education. In my life - work included - I try to contribute to a simple, egalitarian, reasonable world. Occasionally, I meet like-minded people who work with me to those ends.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: it feels good and because I have it to give. A friend got me started with a gift certificate. Very cool.

lender.name: jay
lender.loan_because: tina and i like to
lender.occupational_info: we make picture frames for people

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity at pursuing their dreams

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to reduce poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the financial affairs of a company that owns and franchises restaurants.

lender.name: Jeannine
lender.loan_because: to help someone who is in need who wants to enjoy an independent life in harmony.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother of three grown children, a grandmother of 4 lovely girls and my husband and I are retired but I continue to grow vegetables and flower plants to sell and to grow in our gardens also.

lender.name: Margo
lender.loan_because: Because I am lucky enough to be able to do so...
lender.occupational_info: I work with kids that come from troubled homes.

lender.name: Frank Camp
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who sincerely want to improve their lives and the lives of those near them.
lender.occupational_info: Retired IBM computer system analyst.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Peter, Sue and Pack
lender.loan_because: it is better to help someone help themselves than just to give handouts

lender.name: Daymond van Hamburg
lender.loan_because: Sharing makes the world a family.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: First and foremost and above all else, this is a world of one, in which micro success can breed new life.
lender.occupational_info: Conventionally trained in unconventional advertising, I come from NYC via ATL, London, Luxembourg, Peru, Spain, California, etc., etc., and etc. A Miami U. grad turned perpetual vagabonder, I hold an insatiable appetite for travel/exploration/cultural and experiental learning.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.occupation: General Manager, Tong Louie Family YMCA

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I admire the courage of small business people and this is a way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I research, write,and organize programs that teach about building and financing new businesses.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: Helping people is something I've always liked to do. Through this program it is so easy to do! I like seeing what exactly I'm helping people with and how its going to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a university student working my way towards my Bachelor's in Computer Science. I also volunteer at an animal shelter called PAWS, where I spend several hours a week helping stray and abandoned kitties find new homes.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Shreyans
lender.loan_because: it is the best gift one can give another, poverty is ubiquitous, and in the world we are here together, we stand as one, and fight as one.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Bethpage High School. I currently want to major in medicine and become a doctor. My hobbies include Martial Arts, drumming, music, and making rhythms...

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: My daughter got me started with Kiva with a Christmas gift.
lender.occupational_info: helping to manage forest ecosystems in a sustainable fashion to provide a variety of forest products, wildlife habitat types, and recreational opportunities.

lender.name: Silvia
lender.loan_because: I believe we all need a little help along the way!
lender.occupational_info: Consultant to restaurants to make them better, faster, more profitable.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Because I like to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 14 year old student in 9th grade.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I am a single Mom who has struggled to make a life for myself and my children for 15 years. However, I am fortunate to live in such a great Country that has allowed me to rise above the circumstances I was born into and become more for myself and my family. I want to help people who do not live under such fortunate social circumstances and allow them to live their dreams of a happy healthy family and a future to look forward to.
lender.occupational_info: I work to acquire and resell computers to major corporations. I wish I did something much more socially glamerous.

lender.name: Tyler & Jill
lender.loan_because: We are blessed!

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: after living in Africa, I know the money that I am lending through Kiva is actually serving its purpose!!!
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research in the fields of psychology and anthropology.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I believe we are bound together by an unending circle of giving and receiving.
lender.occupational_info: I was gifted by God with a distinctive voice. I use my voice to earn a living doing radio and TV commercials as well as non-broadcast projects.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-finance, the power it employs & helping those less fortunate with what I have (& not worry about the latest fad & trend).
lender.occupational_info: Realtor's help people buy and sell property. My aim is to make the process as easy as possible while thoroughly educating my client.

lender.name: Kim
lender.occupation: Owner of a video production studio
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and really feel that owning your own business is the only way to independence - especially for the working poor.
lender.occupational_info: I work with my husband making educational videos that we sell via our website and/or distributors. We also work with clients making commercial videos for their businesses and also videotape client's events and/or seminars.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: The power of many small loans can have a real impact
lender.occupational_info: Strategic technology & design firm

lender.name: Barnaby
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of business to improve and transform lives. "Corporate" has become a dirty word, but I still believe that capitalism is the best way to distribute resources and reward effort.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the Founder and CEO of Foodista.com, the cooking encyclopedia that everyone can edit.

lender.name: Klaus Hennum Prod as
lender.loan_because: We belive this is the most effective way of helping people. "Loans that changes lifes" says it all!

lender.name: Marjo-Riikka Makela
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I teach, I act, I do my share and wish to do it better every day

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: Because this money I lend will make better use in someone else’s hands. I believe in helping others help themselves. What I get back will go out to next entrepreneur, one at time.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with massive debts to reconstruct their financial sitation. I have the power of law to force lenders to cut or give in to their demands. We don’t talk rich people, we talk normal persons who’s in debt after a divorce or after a house sale to too low price or after they became sick or disabled or got unemployed or…. you name it.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to give women around the world a fair chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a local politician and work with immigrants in my area.

lender.name: Gunilla
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a specialistnurse, treating cancer patients with radiationtherapy.
